title: Create Reapers Asylum MC motorcycle club app

requirements.text: Create a homepage that showcases the Reapers Asylum MC motorcycle club with sections for club overview, mission statement, and featured content
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays club name prominently
Mission statement section is visible and readable
Layout is responsive and works on mobile devices

requirements.text: Implement a members roster page that displays club members with their roles (President, Vice President, Road Captain, Secretary, Members, etc.)
acceptanceCriteria: Members are displayed with their names and club roles
Backend stores member data with role assignments
Only authorized users can view the full roster

requirements.text: Create an events calendar feature where club members can view upcoming rides, meetings, and club events
acceptanceCriteria: Events display with date, time, location, and description
Calendar view shows events chronologically
Backend persists event data

requirements.text: Implement user authentication using Internet Identity so members can log in and access member-only features
acceptanceCriteria: Users can authenticate via Internet Identity
Authenticated state persists across page refreshes
Login/logout functionality works correctly

requirements.text: Create a club news feed where administrators can post announcements and updates visible to all members
acceptanceCriteria: News posts display in reverse chronological order
Each post shows title, content, author, and timestamp
Backend stores and retrieves news posts

requirements.text: Implement a photo gallery section for club ride photos and event memories
acceptanceCriteria: Photos display in a responsive grid layout
Users can click to view full-size images
Backend stores photo metadata and references

requirements.text: Design a bold, edgy visual theme inspired by motorcycle club aesthetics with dark colors, leather textures, metallic accents, and rugged typography that reflects the brotherhood and rebellious spirit of a motorcycle club, consistently applied across all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Visual theme uses dark color palette with metallic accents
Typography reflects motorcycle club style
Design is consistent across all pages and components

constraints: Use Internet Identity for authentication, no third-party auth providers
All backend logic must be in a single Motoko actor
Frontend must use React with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
nonGoals: Integration with external mapping services for ride routes
Real-time chat or messaging between members

required: Skull with motorcycle wings logo for club emblem, edgy and bold style with metallic finish (club-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Dark textured background with subtle leather and chrome patterns for hero section (hero-background.dim_1920x800.png)
Motorcycle silhouette icon for events section in metallic silver style (event-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Road banner image showing open highway with dramatic lighting for rides section (road-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
